verses.name: Joshua 15:40
verses.text: And Cabbon, and Lahmam, and Kithlish,

verses.name: Joshua 15:41
verses.text: And Gederoth, Beth–dagon, and Naamah, and Makkedah; sixteen cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:43
verses.text: And Jiphtah, and Ashnah, and Nezib,

verses.name: Joshua 15:44
verses.text: And Keilah, and Achzib, and Mareshah; nine cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:45
verses.text: Ekron, with her towns and her villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:46
verses.text: From Ekron even unto the sea, all that lay near Ashdod, with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:47
verses.text: Ashdod with her towns and her villages, Gaza with her towns and her villages, unto the river of Egypt, and the great sea, and the border thereof:
